ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In Our eyes they are among the best of chosen men.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are the chosen ones, the excellent in Our sight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In Our sight they are among the chosen and excellent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In Our eyes they were of the chosen, virtuous people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And in Our sight, they are indeed the chosen ones, the beloved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they are with Us, verily, of the chosen and the best!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely they were with Us, of the elect, the best.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and in Our sight they are of the chosen, the excellent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! in Our sight they are verily of the elect, the excellent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and, in Our sight they were indeed among the select, the truly good!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily they are with us of the elect of the excellent ones
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed they are surely with Us among the elect of the best.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They were, in Our sight, truly, of the company of the Elect and the Good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they are with Us, verily, of the chosen and the best!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed with Us they are among the chosen, the excellent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To Us they are among the chosen, the outstanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:47] And indeed in Our sight they are of the elect, the excellent (akhyār is the plural of khayyir).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! in Our sight they are verily of the elect, the excellent) they are selected in the life of the world for prophethood and Islam and they are excellent in Allah's sight on the Day of Judgement.
